javadoc: Notifications for when services are added to or removed from a PluginTool.

methods.name: serviceAdded
methods.comment: Notifies the listener that a service has been added to the tool.

params.name: interfaceClass
params.comment: the interface class that the given service implements.

methods.name: serviceRemoved
methods.comment: Notifies the listener that a service has been removed from the tool.

params.name: interfaceClass
params.comment: the interface class that the given service implements.

name: ServiceListener
comment: Notifications for when services are added to or removed from a PluginTool.
